content: **knitted jumper in drops melody the piece is worked top down with diagonal/ european shoulders split in sides and double neck sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-107 yarn group d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl xxl **yarn** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needles size 7 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 6 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge ** 13 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
